thread.title: Bishop-McCann Expands Operations - Adds New York Office, Hires Tamara Duffy as Sales Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Bishop-McCann Expands Operations - Adds New York Office, Hires Tamara Duffy as Sales Director

organizations.name: bishop-mccann expands operations - adds new york office

text:
KANSAS CITY, Mo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bishop-McCann, a worldwide leader in the meetings, incentive programs and events industry, is adding to its offices and staff to meet its growing portfolio and expansion of business.
Industry veteran Tamara Duffy, joins the Bishop-McCann team as Sales Director. Duffy has 14 years of experience working with Fortune 1000 companies on strategic initiatives. She specializes in meeting and event services, sales incentives, organizational learning strategies, loyalty, recognition and reward programs.
Duffy is based out of Bishop-McCann’s recently opened New York office. This marks the fifth Bishop-McCann location, complementing offices in Kansas City, Chicago, San Francisco and Minneapolis.
“Joining a team that is consistently ranked as one of the Top 25 Meeting & Event agencies is thrilling,” said Duffy. “Bishop-McCann’s mission to clients is creating 'Joy,' and I’m excited to support that by working with companies to solve their unique sets of needs and challenges.”
“We’re thrilled to add Tamara’s experience and industry knowledge to our team,” said Rob Adams, Bishop-McCann President & CEO. “We look forward to expanding our national footprint with the addition of Tamara and our New York office.”
Prior to joining Bishop-McCann, Tamara worked for BI Worldwide and OC Tanner as a business development and strategic advisor for the Financial, Insurance, Consumer Product Goods, Pharmaceuticals, Retail, Technology, Automotive and Manufacturing industries.
For more information, visit bishopmccann.com .
About Bishop-McCann:
Bishop-McCann is one of the industry leaders in producing meetings, incentive programs and events worldwide. Headquartered in Kansas City, Mo., with offices in Chicago, San Francisco, Minneapolis and New York, Bishop-McCann’s mission statement – We Create Joy
